paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Pteroplius Audinet-Serville 1835: 65
is an incorrect subsequent spelling of Pterhoplius
Lacordaire, 1830: 183
, introduced by
Audinet-Serville, 1835: 65
, in prevailing usage (Article 33.3.1)

Pteroplia Thomson, 1860: 73
incorrect subsequent spelling of
Pteroplius Lacordaire, 1830
not in prevailing usage. Type-species:
Pteroplius acuminatus Audinet-Serville, 1835
(by subsequent designation
Thomson, 1864: 107
).
